markdownRemark.html: The role of commentary in the school market for Terence is explored in greater depth in my new essay, "Selling Terence in Renaissance Italy: The Marketing Power of Commentary," which appears in Classical Commentaries: Explorations in a Scholarly Genre (Oxford, Oxford University Press, 2015), 254-274.
